programme.title: Ujian Cinta Timun Mas

programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: POV Punya Pacar Semanis Kamu
programme.desc: Alexa is still in touch with her future husband. But it turns out that her future husband is having an affair behind Alexa's back. So what is the fate of Alexa's romance, because it turns out that her relationship is much disapproved of?

programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthi's naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Punnagai Poove
programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - NERANJAMANASU
programme.desc: After the villagers of Suriyakudi choose Ayyanar to be their saviour, he puts Sivanandi in jail for killing his father. However, after many years, Sivanandi comes back to take his revenge.

programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Annam

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: La Fille D'albino Rodrigue
programme.desc: Rosemay, aged 16, lives with a foster family and only sees her biological family during the holidays. One day, her father doesn't turn up at the train station to collect her. Since he doesn't reappear and her mother gives only evasive replies, the teenager begins to fear the worst...

programme.title: Le Mobilier
programme.desc: A gallery specialising in contemporary art organises a preview presenting a range of different artistic performances. Iliadia, the cleaner, can't understand the point of it and is irritated by the behaviour of certain visitors.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: Objectif Monde - EP 7
programme.desc: Four national languages, as many cultural regions, twenty cantons: how did Switzerland manage to build a nation and have such a high GDP? How does the country face climate change? And why does it allow assisted suicide and is about to legalize the sale of cannabis?

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 4
programme.desc: Suffering from dystonia after catching malaria in Angola, Orvedi Claudio learnt to deal with a difficult body. Helped by his mother, who wanted to give him a better future, he came to France. Now studying at the prestigious Henri IVcollege, he is cultivating his passion for literature.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Normandie Ne Partira Pas Ce Soir
programme.desc: It was the world's largest, most beautiful and fastest cruise ship. Built in Saint Nazaire in 1932, the ''Normandie'' was the pride of France. But it took only a few hours, amidst the chaos of World War Two, for this dream of grandeur to lie broken in New York harbour.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Ce Qui A Ete Et Ce Qui Restera...
programme.desc: For the last fifteen years, Thomas Fisch has travelled the Sahel and northern Niger in search of the Wodaabe Fula. Renowned for their cattle herds, the migrations of this nomadic people depend on the vagaries of weather and politics. Today some prefer to settle, whilst others maintain their traditional values.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 10
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neo-nationalism.

programme.title: Au Nom De Nos Ancetres, Esclaves Et Negociants
programme.desc: Aurelie Bambuck and Axelle Balguerie share the same history: their ancestors participated in the transatlantic slave trade. One is the descendent of slaves while the other is the heiress of traders. The two women face up to their past and lay the foundations of an appeased memory. Encounter.

programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Rallye Monte-Carlo Historique 2025
programme.desc: A look back at the 27th edition of the Historical Monte-Carlo Rally, which took place between 29 January and 5 February 2025, a competition reserved for cars that took part in previous editions of the Monte-Carlo Automobile Rally.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 9
programme.desc: Twice a year, the equinoxes create exceptional tidal ranges that draw impressive crowds. Particularly popular, Saint Malo is home to the world's most impressive tides, and all the more so during the equinoxes. To better understand the phenomenon, Sophie Ladame meets geologist Odile Guerin under the full moon.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1576
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 2
programme.desc: Julien joins Vale and Alex, the nomadic pair behind the YouTube channel Prets pour la Route, ready to head off and discover Grand Manan Island. We discover their lives as content creators living in their 7m² caravan.

programme.title: Quand L'afrique Sauva La France
programme.desc: 1940. When de Gaulle called on the French to join him he hardly imagined that he would be leading the struggle to liberate France from the heart of black Africa. Brazzaville became the capital of Free France. In these mobilised colonies, an immense desire for independence was coming to life.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 35
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 49
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 3
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 42
programme.desc: Alix would really love to feature in the story Big Boss is busy writing. Whilst she's trying to think what she could do that would be worth writing about, Hatter and Hare are making one blunder after another.

The only clue for the police: a few days earlier he had used the ''Minitel Rose'', an erotic chat service, to contact a libertine couple. Gradually, the investigators discovered a demonic duo.

programme.desc: After losing her husband and baby during World War I, Louise decides to devote her life to caring for the children of others as nanny and governess. Many years later, thanks to one of these children, she meets up again with all the children she raised over a Christmas meal.

programme.desc: The family is working hard to prepare a surprise for Francois on his birthday. Meanwhile, Jean-Pierre and Rollande are trying out social media. They're surprised just how fast their posts become the buzz of the town and how aggressive some people's comments are.

programme.desc: Nadia and Vincent have finally arrived in Tuktoyaktuk. In the company of Michele and Bruce, they discover the lifestyle of the inhabitants. The traditions are strong but will they survive now that Dempster Highway links this community to the rest of Canada?

programme.title: Les Images De Mademoiselle Devos
programme.desc: Flanders, 1922. Suffering from tuberculosis, the young Jeanne Devos is sent to live with an enlightened priest. Twenty years later she becomes the first professional photographer in the Nord. Recounting everyday life at the time, her pictures reveal the keen eye of an iconoclast whose work remains little known.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 26
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: A Travers Champs - EP 1
programme.desc: According to specialists on the issue, 50% of farmers suffer from psychological distress. It's a profession with high levels of stress and huge responsibilities, which are often assumed alone or as a couple.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Habitants Du Nord - EP 11
programme.desc: Nadia and Vincent have finally arrived in Tuktoyaktuk. In the company of Michele and Bruce, they discover the lifestyle of the inhabitants. The traditions are strong but will they survive now that Dempster Highway links this community to the rest of Canada?

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 36
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 50
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 4
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 10
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 43
programme.desc: Alix is excited about the idea of getting back to her friends in the land of the Wonderfolk. Unfortunately for her, Big Boss has set them to work on an endless list of jobs.

programme.title: A Travers Champs - EP 1
programme.desc: According to specialists on the issue, 50% of farmers suffer from psychological distress. It's a profession with high levels of stress and huge responsibilities, which are often assumed alone or as a couple.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1578
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 14
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'etabli
programme.desc: 1968. Robert, graduated from ecole Normale Superieur and extreme left militant, is hired by Citroen as assembly line worker to revive the revolutionary fire. When the company requires workers to work three hours overtime per week for no pay, Robert and some others see the opportunity for a social movement.

programme.title: Le Coffre
programme.desc: A deserted carpark, strange sounds coming from the boot of a car. Will Sebastien open the boot? Yes. That is, until his mother gets involved...

programme.title: L'absente - EP 1
programme.desc: A young woman wakes up in hospital after a car accident. Completely amnesiac, she has forgotten everything, including her identity, but the police recognise Marina Masson, a girl kidnapped eleven years ago. Her parents, now separated, hurry to her. Then the body of the suspected kidnapper, Ivan Claes, is found.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 2
programme.desc: Marina secretly meets someone called Mael, with whom she's planning to run away. As Laurent Masson, Marina's father, becomes closer to Helene, his ex-wife, and their children, an identity card in the name of Alexandra Martinez is found in the jacket Marina had lost. Is she an imposter?

programme.title: Movie - Dev
programme.desc: Dev, an adventure-loving young man, often embarks on escapades with his best friend Vicky. His life takes a turn when Vicky tries to set him up with Meghna, a USA-based businesswoman.

programme.title: Movie - February 14
programme.desc: Shiva falls in love with Pooja, a girl raised in the US, who is in India visiting her grandparents. When she wants to return to the US, he creates a fictitious character to impress her.

programme.title: Movie - Nenjathai Killadhae
programme.desc: Aanandi meets Vasan who likes experimenting with life's various situations. They challenge each other for another experiment during which she actually falls in love with him. But Vasan rejects her.

programme.title: Movie - Neruppukul Eeram
programme.desc: Police officer Karthik is hell-bent on putting Baba, a local goon, behind bars. However, Karthik's fiancee Radha asks him to forgive Baba by giving him a chance to reform himself.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Veadha
programme.desc: Two brothers are in love with the same girl. The elder brother, who the girl is in love with, convinces her to marry his brother. But on the day of the wedding, a shocking truth comes out and it changes their lives from there on.

programme.title: Movie - Adharmam
programme.desc: Dharma is a sandalwood smuggler who plants a sapling for every tree he chops. After his death, his brother Arjuna handles the business and asserts that the state is responsible for the rise in crime.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Oorille Oru Rajakumari
programme.desc: After being mistreated by his family for being unemployed, a youth decides to get married only to a princess but eventually falls for a poor girl. The girl is actually a princess and is in search of a man who will love her for her and not her riches.

programme.title: Movie - Vanna Thamizh Pattu
programme.desc: The village head is amazed at the singing talent of their new servant. A girl in the family falls in love with the servant. The truth is revealed that he is married to the village head's daughter.

programme.title: Movie - Kannu Pada Pokuthaiya
programme.desc: Vetrivel, a respected man, dearly loves his brother and sacrifices his love for him. Problems arise when his brother, Subramaniyam, starts suspecting him of having an affair with his wife Gowri.

programme.title: Movie - Bhavani
programme.desc: Bhavani, an honest police officer, is posted as an ACP in Tirunelveli, a land ruled by Sivalingam, a goon and aspiring politician. Her efforts to enforce the law bring her in direct conflict with Siva.

programme.title: Movie - Nilaa Kaalam
programme.desc: Nila's mother, an actress, is separated from her husband. Nila has all the comforts but no friends. She befriends two boys who work in a garage. They plan a picnic that may change everything forever.

programme.title: Movie - Nimidangal
programme.desc: A man manages to find a job in the city. There, he befriends a young girl and finds love. Things change after he falls into the trap of a blackmailer.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Vedikkai Enn Vadikkai
programme.desc: Kandasamy, who always interferes in others' problems, comes to his sister's house to set things straight and also for his personal benefits.

programme.title: Movie - Unnai Vaazthi Padugiren
programme.desc: Ravi, a mechanic, is still in love with his ex-wife Priya, who left him because of a terrible lie. When Asha, a wealthy girl, falls for Ravi and gets rejected, she commits suicide.

programme.title: Movie - Puthu Manithan
programme.desc: Kabali, a fisherman who is both revered and dreaded, falls for Suganthi, a chorus singer, and tries to woo her. When he is about to declare his love, she announces her marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Unakkaka Ellam Unakkaka
programme.desc: Sakthivel, an irresponsible man, disapproves of the marriage arranged for him by his father and tries to ruin it. However, he is surprised to learn that the prospective bride is the woman he loves.

programme.title: Movie - Amman
programme.desc: An evil man tries to bury a live virgin. A girl witnesses this and calls the police. As revenge, his mother vows to make the girl's life a misery, but the village goddess Amman protects her.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City (MW31) (Live) - EP 309
programme.desc: Manchester United haven’t lost any of their last three meetings with Man City in all competitions (W2 D1), last having a longer run between January 2010 and February 2011 (4).

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25 - EP 34
programme.desc: Having arrived on these shores to manage Bournemouth in 2023, Andoni Iraola took over a club which had narrowly avoided relegation. programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 15
programme.desc: Premier League striker Glenn Murray builds his ultimate One-to-Eleven, selecting the best he’s played with. programme.title: Ipswich Town vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW31) - EP 303
programme.desc: Ipswich have lost each of their last five home Premier League matches - only once in their league history have they suffered six consecutive home defeats, doing so between September and November 1963.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW31) - EP 302
programme.desc: Following their 3-1 win at the Amex Stadium in December, Crystal Palace are looking to complete their first league double over Brighton since 1932-33 (Third Division South), and for the first time ever in the top-flight.

programme.title: Everton vs Arsenal (MW31) - EP 301
programme.desc: Everton have lost just two of their last 13 Premier League matches at Goodison Park (W4 D7), drawing each of their last three. They haven’t drawn four in a row at home in the competition since between January and February 2015.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City (MW31) - EP 309
programme.desc: Manchester United haven’t lost any of their last three meetings with Man City in all competitions (W2 D1), last having a longer run between January 2010 and February 2011 (4).

programme.title: Fulham vs Liverpool (MW31) - EP 307
programme.desc: Liverpool have scored 38 goals in 15 away Premier League matches this season, an average of 2.53 goals per game. That is their joint best in a top-flight season, also scoring at the same rate in 2013-14 (48 in 19 games, 2.53).

programme.title: Brentford vs Chelsea (MW31) - EP 306
programme.desc: Brentford are the only side without a home Premier League clean sheet this season and have gone 16 home league games without a shutout. They’ve never gone 17 home league matches without keeping a clean sheet.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Southampton (MW31) - EP 308
programme.desc: Spurs have won one of their last 10 home Premier League matches (D3 L6), picking up just six points. Across their 10 games at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium beforehand, they won seven games and 21 points.

programme.title: Everton vs Arsenal (MW31) - EP 301
programme.desc: Everton have lost just two of their last 13 Premier League matches at Goodison Park (W4 D7), drawing each of their last three. They haven’t drawn four in a row at home in the competition since between January and February 2015.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2024/25 - EP 17
programme.desc: Mario Melchiot recalls his Premier League journey, which began as part of an ambitious Chelsea team. The Dutch defender played in the Blues’ high-stakes final day clash in 2003 with Liverpool, before moving to Birmingham City and then captaining Wigan Athletic.

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25 - EP 44
programme.desc: From a Premier League captain to a Dutch police detective. PL Stories goes behind the scenes with Arjan de Zeeuw as he revisits the places that shaped him, offers a rare glimpse into his life at work, and explores his growing desire to return to the game.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City (MW31) - EP 309
programme.desc: Manchester United haven’t lost any of their last three meetings with Man City in all competitions (W2 D1), last having a longer run between January 2010 and February 2011 (4).

programme.title: Fulham vs Liverpool (MW31) - EP 307
programme.desc: Liverpool have scored 38 goals in 15 away Premier League matches this season, an average of 2.53 goals per game. That is their joint best in a top-flight season, also scoring at the same rate in 2013-14 (48 in 19 games, 2.53).

programme.title: Brentford vs Chelsea (MW31) - EP 306
programme.desc: Brentford are the only side without a home Premier League clean sheet this season and have gone 16 home league games without a shutout. They’ve never gone 17 home league matches without keeping a clean sheet.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Southampton (MW31) - EP 308
programme.desc: Spurs have won one of their last 10 home Premier League matches (D3 L6), picking up just six points. Across their 10 games at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium beforehand, they won seven games and 21 points.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City (MW31) (Live) - EP 309
programme.desc: Manchester United haven’t lost any of their last three meetings with Man City in all competitions (W2 D1), last having a longer run between January 2010 and February 2011 (4).

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City (MW31) (Live) - EP 309
programme.desc: Manchester United haven’t lost any of their last three meetings with Man City in all competitions (W2 D1), last having a longer run between January 2010 and February 2011 (4).

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25 - EP 34
programme.desc: Having arrived on these shores to manage Bournemouth in 2023, Andoni Iraola took over a club which had narrowly avoided relegation. Today, they are considered one of the toughest sides to play against in the Premier League. With exclusive access, this week the Bournemouth manager gives the Big Interview a guided tour of some of the local spots he likes to visit on the Dorset coastline.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 15
programme.desc: Premier League striker Glenn Murray builds his ultimate One-to-Eleven, selecting the best he’s played with. A key figure in Brighton’s rise to the top flight and a proven goal scorer, Glenn shares stories from his career and what it takes to succeed at the highest level. Find out which stars make his lineup.

programme.title: Ipswich Town vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW31) - EP 303
programme.desc: Ipswich have lost each of their last five home Premier League matches - only once in their league history have they suffered six consecutive home defeats, doing so between September and November 1963.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW31) - EP 302
programme.desc: Following their 3-1 win at the Amex Stadium in December, Crystal Palace are looking to complete their first league double over Brighton since 1932-33 (Third Division South), and for the first time ever in the top-flight.

programme.title: Everton vs Arsenal (MW31) - EP 301
programme.desc: Everton have lost just two of their last 13 Premier League matches at Goodison Park (W4 D7), drawing each of their last three. They haven’t drawn four in a row at home in the competition since between January and February 2015.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City (MW31) - EP 309
programme.desc: Manchester United haven’t lost any of their last three meetings with Man City in all competitions (W2 D1), last having a longer run between January 2010 and February 2011 (4).

programme.title: FS MMA Nick Thompson vs. Davion Peterson
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! BodogFight former welterweight champion Nick Thompson looks to send Davion Peterson into submission in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka 'The Galaxy Warrior', (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali 'Rush Hour' Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Juan Diaz
programme.desc: This episode features a lightweight title bout between Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: Top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 features Hakuho, Endo, Okinoumi and Yutakayamai from the Osaka Prefectural Gymnasium, in Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights 'Sugar' Shane Mosley (43-4, 37 KOs) and Luis Collazo (27-2, 13 KOs) fighting over the interim WBC title. This fight took place at the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA, on February 10, 2007.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judo's biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Gennady Golovkin vs. Grzegorz Proksa
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the American debut of future unified middleweight world champion Gennady Golovkin, who takes on Grzegorz Proska. Also on the card, action from kickboxing star Nieky Holzken.

programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Carlos Manuel Baldomir, aka 'Tata' (42-9, 12 KOs) vs. Arturo 'Thunder' Gatti (40-7, 31 KOs) in a bout to unify the WBC and IBA titles. The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 22, 2006.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Andy Lee vs. Craig McEwan
programme.desc: This episode features the 24-1 Andy Lee facing off with the 19-0 Craig McEwan, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Paul Williams defending his welterweight championship against Carlos Quintana. The fight's result ultimately ended up being what might be considered one of the biggest upsets in boxing.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: Top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 features Chiyotairyu, Aoiyama, Takarafuji and Mitakeumi from the Osaka Prefectural Gymnasium in Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz helps out with children's charities and feeding the hungry. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.desc: The twin provinces of Samar and Leyte were the first hit by the world's strongest typhoon, but here, Jaime gets to cruise a river like a torpedo, rides the Pacific waves and dances like a farm bird.

programme.title: Ride N' Seek: Quest For The Priestess' Cloak - EP 6
programme.desc: In the last stretch of her journey, Jaime makes her way to Northern Mindanao, where she conquers a river of giant crocodiles, battles ancient tribesmen and earns the dream coat of Manobo princesses.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII - EP 3
programme.desc: After finding Nazi artifacts at a sunken pier, Darrell continues his search to a site known as Target 3 where they find a possible component of a Nazi secret weapon that changes their investigation.

programme.title: The History Hustle - EP 1
programme.desc: Simon Yin is hustlin', and he wants to take you along for the ride. He's uncovering the ancient Chinese secret, quizzing the locals, and running rampant with a rickshaw. This is The History Hustle!

programme.title: The History Hustle - EP 2
programme.desc: Simon Yin is in Metro Manila and he's bringing out that national pride. He's flagging down the locals, quizzing their knowledge, and being a complete yoyo. This is The History Hustle!

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 616
programme.desc: Rick and Corey race to San Diego to take a spin in the classic car Hell's Chariot, from the movie Grease. Is the flaming hot rod the one that they want, or will they 'drop out' of the deal?

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Picture this: a full-body gas mask for babies. How about Smell-o-Vision? Or a robot powered by eating slugs? These are all real inventions, and we've got them covered.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23) - EP 45
programme.desc: Rick and the gang geek out when some cool items from the space program land in the store: a U.S. flag from Apollo 16, an Apollo program book featuring a Charles Schultz signature and a far out meteoroid.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: Two heavy hitting cereal rivals duke it out for breakfast dominance. Competition heats up when an idea is stolen, beaten to the market, and is a runaway success.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: In the late 1800s Americans rarely bathed, lived in filthy conditions and deadly diseases were commonplace. But James Gamble and Harley Procter invent a revolutionary new soap that revolutionises America.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 617
programme.desc: When a seller whips into the shop with an 'Energy Dome' hat made for the band DEVO, will Rick's offer top the charts? Then, Corey takes a shot at a decanter set that supposedly belonged to Buffalo Bill.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17) - EP 96
programme.desc: Dani and Mike combine for star power picking and find rare Beatles and Evel Knievel items.

programme.desc: The team investigates a large wooden shipwreck that could be one of the Bermuda Triangle area's earliest victims: the long-lost SS D.H. Mount.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S34 - EP 28
programme.desc: We meet a forest therapy guide who shows us how immersing oneself in nature can support mental health.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Derek heads to Cambray Cheese in what he says is a town named after him - Nannup! He tries black garlic in Osmington, before watching a local dive for freshwater marron.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 9
programme.desc: It's NAIDOC Week on The Cook Up, and Warndu's Damien Coulthard, Haus of Dizzy's Kristy Dickinson and host Nornie Bero are making family pie.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome S2 - EP 4

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 8
programme.desc: Ready made meals from game meats; A new way of oyster farming; The Italian winegrowers taking inspiration from down under; plus confusion over mandated goat and sheep electronic identification tags.

programme.title: Offsiders (2025) - EP 10
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi joins Jo Weston, Phil Waugh and Gideon Haigh to discuss the start of the Super Netball season, Aussie teams' solid start in Super Rugby, Sam Kerr remains Matildas captain plus the latest AFL, NRL and cricket news.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 7

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 69

programme.title: High Noon

programme.desc: When two best friends hiking the Grand Canyon trust an experienced hiking guide to bring them on an off-trail adventure, things go south when he takes them captive. They have to fight both man and nature.

programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Meet The Press 2025
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon 2025
programme.desc: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon made its debut from Studio 6B in Rockefeller Center on Feb. 17, 2014. Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europe’s equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. Bridging the European and U.S. trading days across asset classes, it breaks key economic data in Europe and provides live price action in the biggest moving stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities.

programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. programme.desc: In 2021, Agnes Tirop broke the women's 10,000 meter world record. Five weeks later, she was dead. We examine her murder and the threat of violence for other Kenyan runners.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We speak with Pranav Yadav, CEO of Neuro-Insight, about the marketing intelligence his company is gleaning from neuroscience.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Liquid Death was founded on the idea of breaking the norms of traditional marketing. We speak to CMO Dan Murphy about the water company's origin as a "sheep in wolf's clothing."

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 1

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputing-where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Geothermal has been the underdog of the energy industry - but that may be about to change as new startups use fracking technologies to expand potential geothermal sites.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets AMD CEO Lisa Su on the heels of her 10-year anniversary as CEO at the chipmaker's labs in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 8

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Can Anduril Reboot the US Defense Industry? Emily Chang meets Anduril founder Palmer Luckey for a closer look at his defence tech startup's autonomous fleet and software operations.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ryan Kaji is the reigning king of toy videos and one of YouTube's biggest and highest-paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents on the set of his new movie for a look at the young influencer's next act.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 7

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Travel Note S3
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Negeri 5 Menara
programme.desc: Six best friends in the Islamic Boarding School often hang out near the mosque towers. All of them made a promise under the tower that one day, they will go to places that they have been dreaming about.

programme.title: Beyond The Limit
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste S2
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Buddy Talk

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Crave

The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 14 (R)
programme.desc: Due to the Bakufu's crackdown on the Todoza, which is a guild of blind men, Kengyo and Sei (Koshiba Fuka) are captured, and even Tsutaju is taken away along with them. After being released, Tsutaju hears that there seems to be a vacant store on Gojikkenmichi Road and begins to consider whether he can become independent and open his own book shop. Meanwhile, Ine (Mizuno Miki) tells him that Gennai’s electric machine Erekiteru is ineffective.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Eps. 6
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: Drama 10 "Happiness Comes from Eating, Sleeping and Waiting" Eps. 1（New） (R)
programme.desc: A 38 years-old single woman Mugimaki Satoko’s life has completely changed after being diagnosed with a "lifelong" illness. She is forced to quit her job and finds an old housing complex with a monthly rent of 50,000 yen. With her landlord living next door and a sketchy cook, Satoko encounters "medicinal cuisine," a way of eating seasonal food to maintain bodily functions. A story that will warm you from the bottom of your stomach, just like a bowl of rice porridge, is about to begin!

programme.title: Drama Serial "Come Come Everybody" Encore Eps. 96
programme.desc: In 1925, radio broadcasting was initiated in Japan and soon after, a program for English language learners began. This is a family drama depicting 100 years of three generations who lived with this English radio program; Yasuko who was born on the same day as the radio broadcasting started, her child Rui, and grandchild Hinata. Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.desc: Amihama Nami (Maruyama Rei), a self-described "frank-mannered" woman, works at a publishing company. She is self-centered, never reflects on herself, and is a new kind of dark heroine who overcomes any difficulties with her amazing high self-esteem and positive thinking! This is a sympathetic comedy about her, who says what she thinks without hesitation, and adults who, in contrast to her, have common sense. By the end, you’ll love to her!

Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Chic Cities - EP 823
programme.desc: Covering consumer shopping information, trendy specialty stores, travel guides, and the LOHAS propositions of trendy people.

programme.title: Taiwan Criminal Files - EP 1368
programme.desc: Discuss the difficult inside story behind the news events, lead the audience to explore the development of the event from an objective perspective, and strive to enlighten the audience's new thinking.

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 513
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: ShinyFoodDiary - EP 69
programme.desc: The host visits various places in a walking and themed way, focusing on what is most fashionable among young people nowadays.Check in on FB and IG to create new highlights and online clicks, not only delicious food, but also in-depth introduction.Introduce the cultural customs and festivals of various places.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1003
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.title: Dee Girls Talk - EP 240
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: Tonight Like War - EP 587
programme.desc: Combine different ethnic groups, fan groups, and poll rankings to cooperate, use big data analysis, reflect market trends, and accurately identify hot topics of concern! Take your seat according to the survey results and attract the attention of all ethnic groups! Use confrontation to stir up sparks and make the topic more watchable!

programme.title: Catch that Spy - EP 5
programme.desc: The host leads the guests to challenge the game. The game is fun and full of wits. The good guys and spies fight for the prize money, and the suspenseful atmosphere brings the audience a new and different experience!

programme.title: Queen of Masks - EP 1
programme.desc: Four friends were involved in a murder, the three turned their backs on the fourth by pinning the accusation on her. Which prompted her to flee to the U.S. Now, ten years later, that fourth friend has returned and plans to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 6
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 7
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Truth - EP 7
programme.desc: Lin Yuanhao and Lin Lan represent the technical staff of the prosecution, using advanced professional technology to help prosecutors solve difficult cases and overcome "zero confession" cases.

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 29
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 30
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 41
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Queen of Masks - EP 1

programme.title: My Sweet Mobster - EP 4
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Seo Ji Hwan (Um Tae Goo) runs a company hiring ex-gang members to help reform their lives. Go Eun-Ha (Han Sun Hwa), a children's YouTube creator, accidentally injures him while working a part-time cleaning job. To her surprise, he recognizes her!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 17
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1922
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 594
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 24
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 32
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Man In Charge - EP 3
programme.desc: Master TAI YAU KUNG (Lau Ka Fai) is skilled in training official advisor for government. He helps his foster son CHOW PING (Ma Kwok Ming) obtain a job in officialdom. PING is a resourceful young man but he holds fast to his own beliefs. He finds all the rules and practices of the officials intolerable so he stays idle all the time. Sometimes he goes tavern to have fun and he falls into the adorable owner CHONG SIU HAN (Leila Tong).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 9
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 10
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 8
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 9
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Man In Charge - EP 3
programme.desc: Master TAI YAU KUNG (Lau Ka Fai) is skilled in training official advisor for government. He helps his foster son CHOW PING (Ma Kwok Ming) obtain a job in officialdom. PING is a resourceful young man but he holds fast to his own beliefs. He finds all the rules and practices of the officials intolerable so he stays idle all the time. Sometimes he goes tavern to have fun and he falls into the adorable owner CHONG SIU HAN (Leila Tong).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 9
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 10
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 11
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 9
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 11
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 5
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Jane’s husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lan’s hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lam’s husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wan’s younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 7
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 30
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other…_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 31
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town.
